_sText:
Terrorists:

Your organization has aquired the computer software that is worth millions
to the wealthy client that hired you. Now the client is refusing to pay you
for the software untill you destroy the only other copy that is stored on
the server at the original programmers work location.
You have discovered that their are two ways you can achieve this task.
1: Destroy the main server using C4 explosives.
2: Destroy the Electrical Sub station causing a power surge to corrupt all 
   data stored on the servers.



Counter Terrorists:

You have been watching the activities of a wealthy business man suspected
of industrial espionage for 8 months. You have learnt from a reliable
informant inside his organization that he has been using a terrorist faction
to steal and destroy software developed by other companies.
In a follow up investigation into this information you have discovered that
the terrorists are planing to destroy data stored at a computer programing
company. This is the break you have been waiting for.
Intercept the terrorists before they can destroy the data using whatever
force is necessary and gather evidence to convict the business man.
